doc.description: Sirf GPS (UART) Driver for GPS modules using the Sirf binary protocol.

configure.name: SIRF_GPS_PORT
configure.description: UART where the GPS is connected to (UART1, UART2, etc

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_GPS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_GPS), sirf)) # this is the secondary GPS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_sirf.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_GPS=GPS_SIRF else $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_sirf.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_GPS=GPS_SIRF endif else # plain old single GPS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DGPS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/gps/gps_sirf.h\" endif
